text: What does it mean if I set chaincode confidential?
If we set chaincode confidential, we will not see chaincode's log or chaincode docker?
<@U11TAFPUP> by “chaincode confidential” I expect you mean enable “security.privacy” ?
I saw it in an example
I also think it is "security.privacy = true".
ok. state is saved as encrypted on the ledger. The chaincode can manipulate the state in the clear
and what else? If I set confidential = true,
it look like I can not see  peer's log related to chaincode deployment and chaincode docker.
You should be able to see the log AFAIK … haven’t tried with privacy enabled recently though
